TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAuthenticationClaimResource extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示從 所建立之宣告的資源類型。

span.span: Represents the resource type for a claim that is created from a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 類別，建立 驗證宣告的 執行個體。Use the class to create a instance for a authentication claim. 類別具有可取得這個類別所能傳送資源的建構函式。The class has a constructor that takes a resource, which this class can be passed to. 安全性權杖會使用 SAML 判斷提示 (Assertion) 來指定其宣告，而這種判斷指示可指定何時驗證此主體。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authenticated. SAML 判斷提示中的宣告會以 SAML 陳述式表示。The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. SAML 規格會定義一組 SAML 陳述式型別，而其中一個為 。The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a . 可判斷該陳述式主體會在特定時間以特定方式通過驗證。A asserts that the statement's subject is authenticated by a particular means at a particular time. 類別表示 的宣告資源。The class represents a claim resource for the .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證方法的集合具有擴充性；但是下表包含的是已定義於 SAML 規格中的驗證方法集合。The set of authentication methods is extensible; however the following table contains the set of authentication methods defined in the SAML specification. |驗證方法Authentication method|URIURI| |---------------------------|---------| |密碼Password|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:passwordurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:password| |KerberosKerberos|urn:ietf:rfc:1510urn:ietf:rfc:1510| |安全遠端密碼 (SRP)Secure Remote Password (SRP)|urn:ietf:rfc:2945urn:ietf:rfc:2945| |硬體權杖Hardware Token|URI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareTokenURI:urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:HardwareToken| |以 SSL/TLS 憑證為基礎的用戶端驗證SSL/TLS Certificate Based Client Authentication|urn:ietf:rfc:2246urn:ietf:rfc:2246| |PGP 公開金鑰PGP Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGPurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:PGP| |SPKI 公開金鑰SPKI Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKIurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:SPKI| |XKMS 公開金鑰XKMS Public Key|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMSurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:XKMS| |XML 數位簽章XML Digital Signature|urn:ietf:rfc:3075urn:ietf:rfc:3075| |未指定Unspecified|urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecifiedurn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.0:am:unspecified|
